heroDescriptions.abathur: Evolution Master of the Zerg Swarm, constantly evolving and adapting.
heroDescriptions.alarak: Highlord of the Tal'darim, arrogant and powerful Protoss.
heroDescriptions.alexstrasza: The Life-Binder, Aspect of Life and Queen of the red dragonflight.
heroDescriptions.amazon: Amazon warrior from the Skovos Isles, master of javelin and bow.
heroDescriptions.ana: Veteran sniper and founding member of Overwatch.
heroDescriptions.anduin: King of Stormwind, wielder of the Light and champion of peace.
heroDescriptions.anubarak: Nerubian king turned undead, loyal servant of the Lich King.
heroDescriptions.artanis: Hierarch of the Daelaam, leader of the unified Protoss.
heroDescriptions.arthas: The Lich King, former paladin turned undead master.
heroDescriptions.auriel: Archangel of Hope, one of the five members of the Angiris Council.
heroDescriptions.azmodan: Lord of Sin, one of the Prime Evils and master strategist.
heroDescriptions.barbarian: Barbarian from the frigid Steppes, master of fury and combat.
heroDescriptions.butcher: Sadistic demon from the depths of Hell, wielder of fresh meat.
heroDescriptions.chen: Pandaren brewmaster, wandering warrior seeking adventure.
heroDescriptions.cho: Left head of Cho'gall, two-headed ogre mage of great power.
heroDescriptions.chromie: Bronze Dragon in gnome form, master of time magic.
heroDescriptions.deathwing: The Destroyer, black Dragon Aspect of Earth and ultimate evil.
heroDescriptions.deckard: The Last Horadrim, wise scholar and identifier of magical items.
heroDescriptions.dehaka: Primal zerg pack leader, collector of essence and evolution.
heroDescriptions.demonhunter: Demon Hunter seeking vengeance against the forces of Hell.
heroDescriptions.diablo: The Lord of Terror, Prime Evil and master of fear.
heroDescriptions.dva: Professional gamer turned mech pilot, protecting South Korea.
heroDescriptions.faeriedragon: Faerie dragon with a cheerful demeanor and dark humor.
heroDescriptions.falstad: Wildhammer dwarf gryphon rider, master of storm and lightning.
heroDescriptions.fenix: Protoss zealot reborn as a dragoon, zealous warrior.
heroDescriptions.firebat: Terran firebat veteran, master of flame and combat engineering.
heroDescriptions.gall: Right head of Cho'gall, spellcaster of the two-headed ogre.
heroDescriptions.garrosh: Former Warchief of the Horde, master of warfare and conquest.
heroDescriptions.gazlowe: Goblin tinker and trade prince, master of gadgets and engineering.
heroDescriptions.genji: Cyborg ninja seeking redemption and inner peace.
heroDescriptions.genngreymane: King of Gilneas, cursed with the worgen form.
heroDescriptions.guldan: Orc warlock and first to make contact with the Burning Legion.
heroDescriptions.hanzo: Master archer seeking to restore his honor and clan.
heroDescriptions.hogger: Infamous gnoll chieftain, terror of Elwynn Forest.
heroDescriptions.illidan: The Betrayer, demon hunter with a tragic past.
heroDescriptions.imperius: Archangel of Valor, leader of the Angiris Council.
heroDescriptions.jaina: Archmage of Dalaran, master of frost magic.
heroDescriptions.johanna: Crusader sworn to the light, champion of justice.
heroDescriptions.junkrat: Explosives-obsessed Australian criminal with a love for chaos.
heroDescriptions.kaelthas: Blood elf prince and master of fire magic.
heroDescriptions.kelthuzad: Archlich and faithful servant of the Lich King.
heroDescriptions.kerrigan: Queen of Blades, former terran ghost turned zerg queen.
heroDescriptions.l90etc: Elite tauren chieftain and rockstar of the Horde.
heroDescriptions.leoric: The Skeleton King, cursed monarch of Tristram.
heroDescriptions.lili: Adventurous pandaren healer with a wandering spirit.
heroDescriptions.lostvikings: Three viking warriors lost in time and space.
heroDescriptions.lucio: DJ and freedom fighter using music to inspire and heal.
heroDescriptions.lunara: First daughter of Cenarius, defender of nature.
heroDescriptions.maiev: Warden seeking justice and revenge against Illidan.
heroDescriptions.malfurion: First druid and protector of the natural world.
heroDescriptions.malganis: Nathrezim dreadlord and manipulator of the Scourge.
heroDescriptions.malthael: Angel of Death, former Aspect of Wisdom.
heroDescriptions.medic: Terran medic dedicated to keeping her allies alive.
heroDescriptions.medivh: The Last Guardian, master of arcane magic and prophecy.
heroDescriptions.meiow: Climatologist and adventurer wielding cryogenic technology.
heroDescriptions.mephisto: Lord of Hatred, one of the Prime Evils.
heroDescriptions.monk: Monk of the Sahptev order, martial artist and healer.
heroDescriptions.muradin: Mountain king of the Bronzebeard clan, explorer and warrior.
heroDescriptions.murky: Baby murloc with big dreams and annoying habits.
heroDescriptions.necromancer: Necromancer of the Priests of Rathma, master of death magic.
heroDescriptions.nexushunter: Iresian bounty hunter wielding a chain blade.
heroDescriptions.nova: Terran ghost operative, master of stealth and psionics.
heroDescriptions.orphea: Heir of Raven Lord, wielder of chaotic magic.
heroDescriptions.probius: Protoss probe worker, builder and defender.
heroDescriptions.ragnaros: The Firelord, elemental lord of fire and destruction.
heroDescriptions.raynor: Terran marshal and rebel leader fighting tyranny.
heroDescriptions.rehgar: Farseer shaman and former gladiator master.
heroDescriptions.rexxar: Beast master and champion of the Horde.
heroDescriptions.samuro: Orc blademaster, master of the blade and illusion.
heroDescriptions.sgthammer: Terran siege tank operator, master of long-range artillery.
heroDescriptions.stitches: Abomination construct, sewn together from corpses.
heroDescriptions.stukov: Infested terran admiral, master of zerg biology.
heroDescriptions.sylvanas: Banshee Queen and former Warchief of the Horde.
heroDescriptions.tassadar: Protoss high templar who sacrificed himself for his people.
heroDescriptions.thrall: Former Warchief and world shaman, wielder of Doomhammer.
heroDescriptions.tracer: Time-jumping adventurer and former Overwatch agent.
heroDescriptions.tychus: Terran marine in powered armor, criminal turned hero.
heroDescriptions.tyrael: Former Archangel of Justice, now mortal protector.
heroDescriptions.tyrande: High Priestess of Elune and leader of the night elves.
heroDescriptions.uther: The Lightbringer, first paladin and mentor to Arthas.
heroDescriptions.valeera: Blood elf rogue and former gladiator.
heroDescriptions.varian: Former King of Stormwind, Lo'Gosh the Ghost Wolf.
heroDescriptions.whitemane: High Inquisitor of the Scarlet Crusade.
heroDescriptions.witchdoctor: Witch doctor from the Teganze tribe, master of spirits.
heroDescriptions.wizard: Wizard from Xiansai, master of arcane magic.
heroDescriptions.yrel: Draenei paladin and liberator of alternate Draenor.
heroDescriptions.zarya: Russian soldier and weightlifter defending her homeland.
heroDescriptions.zeratul: Dark templar prelate, seeker of truth and prophecy.
heroDescriptions.zuljin: Forest troll warlord and chieftain of the Amani tribe.
